page.title: 19Police Stables
page.content: The{Police Stables}were once owned by {Mrs Pennyman }but they are now owned by the Natianal Trust.The police rent the stables.There are six stables for each horse.Each horse has its own name.{ {Nimrod,Sam,Maryrose,Robson,Jubilee, {and Pennyman.}The building is made out of sandstone and next door it has a room.The saddles and bridles are kept there.The police on saturdays go to football match and they have to wear protective gear so that people don't through things at them.The stables were opened on July 1973 by {Alderman {E A Dickinson.}In Ormesby there are four policemen and one policewoman. The horses are aged between 4 and 16.They are trained tobe quiet, obedient,and not afraid of traffic or crowds.
